divs: sighting detailsthis is a part of a 1:49 hd video i took with a flip video camera, in hopes of and partially joking, to capture a ufo. i really didn't expect to find what i did. glendale az 12\26\12 apr. 3 p.m.. i first noticed the object as i watched the jet fly across the background at around 45:42. there is a jet heading right to left (north) then for some depth perception a bird passes at heading north as well. and an object enters the top left of the screen. heading southeast then turning northeast. i have no knowledge of anything that is able to move that fast. also i can almost hear the jets noise in the background yet i heard nothing from this object traveling at what seems to be incredible speed.
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Glendale
There were no other sightings in Glendale on or around December 26th 2012
